connect20/netstarter_imageswitcher.name: connect20/Netstarter_Imageswitcher

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/netstarter_imageswitcher.description: Image switcher allows you to easily present products in Magento that come in a variety of images depending on multiple configurable attributes such as Color and Material.
